summary: The module supplies multiple signaling back‑ends for establishing WebRTC connections with aiortc, offering lightweight copy‑and‑paste exchange, TCP socket communication, and Unix domain socket messaging. It also includes helper utilities for command‑line argument integration and converting signaling objects to and from string representations.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly set up and test peer‑to‑peer media streams by providing simple, interchangeable signaling mechanisms that handle the exchange of session descriptions and ICE candidates across different transport methods.
